name: py-dask-glm
description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.description: Extended pickling support for Python objects.

dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-multipledispatch
dependencies.description: A relatively sane approach to multiple dispatch in Python.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.description: Jupyter metapackage. Install all the Jupyter components in one go.

dependencies.description:
nbsphinx is a Sphinx extension that provides a source parser for *.ipynb
files.

dependencies.name: py-notebook
dependencies.description: Jupyter Interactive Notebook

dependencies.description: numpydoc - Numpy's Sphinx extensions

dependencies.name: pandoc
dependencies.description:
If you need to convert files from one markup format into another, pandoc
is your swiss-army knife.

dependencies.name: py-s3fs
dependencies.description:
S3FS builds on aiobotocore to provide a convenient Python filesystem
interface for S3.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: llvm
dependencies.description:
The LLVM Project is a collection of modular and reusable compiler and
toolchain technologies. Despite its name, LLVM has little to do with
traditional virtual machines, though it does provide helpful libraries
that can be used to build them. The name "LLVM" itself is not an
acronym; it is the full name of the project.

dependencies.name: cairo
dependencies.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependencies.name: harfbuzz
dependencies.description: The Harfbuzz package contains an OpenType text shaping engine.
